      • getJarURI

        public static URI getJarURI(URI jarResourceURI)
        Extracts the jar URI part from a jar resource URI.

        A jar resource URI has the following form:
        jar:<jarURIPart>!/<resource entry>.
        Parameters:
        jarResourceURI - a jar resource URI
        Returns:
        the jar URI

      • newJarFileSystem

        Returns:
        a new JAR FileSystem for the specified JAR URI
        Throws:
